name: Pinkyball - Endless Dodge
description:
Pinkyball is an endless dodge hyper - casual game that we made. This game has a really basic mechanic, you must just click to screen!

You have a 2 change before that you fail, be careful!

This is my first game, please send me your comments in below. 

I want to make different games and I'm alredy work for that. If you guys want to support me, I 'd appreciate it!

METE OUT!

Sound effects and music obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
